summary: Provides a UI control class that renders Rive vector animations within Flet applications, exposing properties for the animation source, selected artboard, alignment, fitting mode, placeholder content, antialiasing, and optional use of the artboard's intrinsic dimensions.
business_intent: Allows developers to integrate high-quality, scalable vector animations from Rive into their Flet-based user interfaces, improving visual appeal and interactivity without heavy resource usage.
